name: Necromantic Physiology
summary: Your unusual physiology has developed in a way that makes it difficult for parasites and other infestations to prey upon you.
description:
Your unusual physiology has developed in a way that makes it difficult for parasites and other infestations to prey upon you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against diseases.Traits

Dhampir: A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These humanoids are the mortal offspring of vampires and members of other ancestries.
